summary: On the day before his scheduled surgery to remove a brain tumor, Elliot meets Chloe Webb, a young photographer who invites him to her art show. An intimate night threatens to be overwritten when Elliot shares his news the next morning.
cast: Parker Croft|Emilia Ares|Barak Hardley|Millie Zinner|Jake Olson|Elizabeth Levin|Nathalie Antonia|Lydie Ben-Zakin|Chris Blim|Bubba Ganter|Jesse Garcia|Aaron Golden|Corin Grant|Chad Matheny|Aly Mawji|Sascha Rasmussen|Christian Yeager|Ari Davis|Michael Finn|Andreea Florescu|Brian Foyster|Jon Michael Hill|Ash Johnson|Jeffrey Parker|Yamil Urena|Conrad Jackson|Joan McMurtrey|Jerome Charvet
keywords: bare chested male|barefoot male|camera shot of feet|camera shot of bare feet|riding a bicycle
title: Falling Overnight
